mapper.select: SELECT message_id messageId, receive_id receiveId, receive_time receiveTime, send_id sendId, send_time sendTime, content content, message_type messageType, read_status readStatus FROM portal_message WHERE message_type = #{messageType.value} AND receive_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO portal_message (message_id, receive_id, receive_time, send_id, send_time, content, message_type, read_status) VALUES (#{messageId}, #{receiveId}, #{receiveTime}, #{sendId}, #{sendTime}, #{content}, #{messageType}, #{readStatus})
